Fales Library and Special Collections
Only Human: HIV-negative Gay Men in the AIDS Epidemic Archive
Nitty Gritty Productions
DiFeliciantonio, Tina
Deitcher, David
Mookas, Ioannis
MSS.376
2 Linear Feet
1995-1996 Only Human: HIV-negative Gay Men in the AIDS Epidemic Archive is comprised of source material, work-in-progress sample reels, masters, and the final cut of the film "Only Human: HIV-negative Gay Men in the AIDS Epidemic. "Only Human: HIV-Negative Gay Men in the AIDS Epidemic" is a documentary that explores the relationship between HIV risk reduction practices and the advent of AIDS.
Biographical/Historical note
"Only Human: HIV-Negative Gay Men in the AIDS Epidemic" is a documentary that explores the relationship between HIV risk reduction practices and the advent of AIDS. The documentary includes interviews that draw from the sexual experiences of HIV-negative men from a variety of backgrounds. "Only Human" simultaneously follows the dramatic struggle of one gay Latino youth's to balance health with sexuality.
Sources:
Turner Classic Movies
Internet Movie Database
Scope and Content
Only Human: HIV-negative Gay Men in the AIDS Epidemic Archive is comprised of source material, work-in-progress sample reels, masters, and the final cut of the film "Only Human: HIV-negative Gay Men in the AIDS Epidemic." The film was directed by Ioannis Mookas, written by David Deitcher, and co-produced by Mookas, Deitcher, and Tina DiFeliciantonio. The videorecordings span from 1995 to 1998.
The collection is arranged in one series:
Series I: Videorecordings: contains 2 boxes of VHS and Betacam SP.
Arrangement
Video recordings are arranged chronologically, when recordings are dated.
Related Material at Fales Library and Special Collections
Mix Collection
Nelson Sullivan Video Collection
Gay Cable Network Archive
Provenance
The Only Human: HIV-negative Gay Men in the AIDS Epidemic Archive was donated to Fales Library by David Deitcher, in September 2013.
Preferred Citation
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); Only Human: HIV-negative Gay Men in the AIDS Epidemic Archive; MSS 376; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
Access copies for some materials are available by appointment for reading room viewing and listening only. Please contact fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
